pageProduct.name: Trilogy Rosehip Oil Light Blend 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Trilogy's certified organic Rosehip Oil Light Blend is a balancing beauty oil that helps regulate oil production while improving the appearance of skin tone, fine lines and wrinkles.

This easily absorbed seed oil blend is lightweight yet deeply nourishing. Enriched with essential fatty acids from rosehip and cranberry to moisturise and nourish, jojoba to soften, grapeseed to help regulate skins own oil production and antioxidant lycopene from tomato seed to provide protection against free radical damage.

Suitable for all skin types, particularly combination/oily skin types or those living in very hot/humid climates.

Key Benefits:
- Hydrates and nourishes
- Balances complexions
- Improves skin tone and appearance of lines

Warnings

To ensure compatibility we recommend patch testing before first use in the unlikely event of a negative reaction, discontinue use and consult your medical professional.

Common Uses

Nourishes, hydrates and balances complexions with a lightweight rosehip, jojoba and grapeseed oil blend.

Directions

Apply 2-3 drop to hands and massage into face, neck and décolletage. Use alone or layer your favourite products. Can also added 2 drops to foundation for an extra dewy finish. Use morning and night, or as required.
